title: Vengeful
description: For months, Sienna Nealon has been targeted by enemies that have hounded her at every turn, destroyed her reputation, and finally, struck at those dearest to her. Operating from the shadows, this mysterious group has never dared to show their faces in their quest for revenge against her.  Until now.  After crossing the final line, now her enemies have left themselves exposed for the first time, and Sienna will stop at nothing to drag them out into the daylight. Because while this may be her enemies' first time playing for vengeance, it certainly isn't Sienna's...
author: Robert J. Crane
